name: Digsert Bus
description:
---DESCRIPTION OF UNFINISHED, PRE-DEADLINE VERSION---

You are Graham Stark. One of the first prizes set to be given away on Desert Bus 2019 is the Desert Bus 3 poster by M. Lunsford, but it's still buried in the ruins of Desert Bus 3, nine Desert Buses below the surface of Desert Bus 2019! Dig your way down to retrieve the poster and save the day, and collect DBloons along the way!

Use the arrow keys or WASD to move, press Space or Z to dig. Dig on a ladder you have revealed to descend a level.
